Finest Stay On the Bay

[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text]The Hotel is strategically situated steps away from the restaurants, shops, and entertainment options offered in 400 Central’s community, as well as the vibrant Central Avenue unveiling the finest gems Downtown Saint Petersburg has to offer. ARTISANAL CUISINE AND ALLURING ENTERTAINMENT AWAIT

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”50″][vc_column_text]Around every corner is a new discovery in your community. 400 Central’s carefully curated selection of high-end retail and entertainment extends over 60,000 square feet on the building’s ground level. Brimming with lavish style and local flair, the shops will impress residents, guests, and visitors alike. From artisanal cuisine and alluring gastro lounges to inviting boutiques and local shops, 400 Central’s community-driven lifestyle experience provides a myriad of opportunities that allow you to enjoy your home to its fullest.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” the secret to having it all

[/vc_column_text][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height=”50″][vc_column_text]Beyond 400 Central’s doors are new discoveries around every corner. The tower’s premier location in Downtown St. Petersburg paves an accessible path to all the city has to offer. From local eateries, world-class museums and galleries, and an abundance of parks and greenspace, St. Petersburg is simply a great place to live.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row type=”full_width_content” full_screen_row_position=”middle” column_margin=”default” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” bg_color=”#303b56″ scene_position=”center” text_color=”light” text_align=”left” row_border_radius=”none” row_border_radius_applies=”bg” overlay_strength=”0.3″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” shape_divider_position=”bottom” bg_image_animation=”none” shape_type=””][vc_column column_padding=”padding-8-percent” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”top-bottom” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”1/1″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” enable_animation=”true” animation=”fade-in” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid”][vc_column_text]
